"The left stick detection test is complete.

Next, perform a test for detecting right stick behavior. Tilt the right stick up while pressing $(0).

"
"Next, tilt the right stick <green>left<c> while pressing $(0)."

"Perform a test to detect whether the left button on the back of the gamepad is an
analog trigger. Press the button that is lit up on the diagram below.

If nothing happens when you press the button, it is not an analog trigger. In that
case, press $(0), and then configure the button in the next screen."

"Perform a test to detect whether the right button on the back of the gamepad is an
analog trigger. Press the button that is lit up on the diagram below.

If nothing happens when you press the button, it is not an analog trigger. In that
case, press $(0), and then configure the button on the next screen."

"If you choose to play this game with a gamepad, you can use the keyboard to chat,
while still having a number of other controls automatically set for your gamepad.

This setting can be changed at any time by selecting "Options," then "Defaults."

Which device do you want to use as your main controller?"
"おもに使用する操作機器選択"

"このゲームをゲームパッドでプレイする場合は、
キーボードをチャット用にしたり、ほかいくつかの
操作をゲームパッド用に自動設定できます。

この設定は、「オプション」の「設定の初期化」から
いつでも変更することができます。

どちらの操作機器をおもに使用しますか？"
